subject: A little girl visiting the dogs?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
At 8 seconds "um, I was just down with puppies" My little yorkies and the
poodle are almost always in the garage with me, and they are tiny, pupply
like. Manual sweep.

 F-S

A  8 seconds "um, I was jus down wi h puppies" My li le yo kies and he poodle a e almos always in he ga age wi h me, and hey a e iny, pupply like. Manual sweep.  
 
 F-S
